title.english: Rise of the Footsoldier: The Heist

production.country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

director.name: Andrew Loveday
director.nationality: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

synopsis.native: Fresh out of prison, Pat Tate steps right back into his Essex nightclub business. Since he can't stop brooding about the man who had him put away, it's not long before he's off to Marbella to find Frank Harris and seek his revenge.
